summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Verityflow AI scam detection system. All core features working correctly including 3-layer detection (rule-based + ML + LLM), frontend UI, and backend APIs.

minor_issues.issue: Empty message validation returns 422 instead of 400
minor_issues.impact: Very minor - 422 is actually more appropriate for validation errors

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responding correctly
Scam message detection with 3-layer analysis system
Phishing message detection with URL scanning
Analyze button triggers analysis with loading state
Result card displays with proper color-coded verdicts
Confidence scores and detailed explanations display
History page loads with analysis records
PDF and CSV export buttons functional
Navigation between Analyzer and History pages
LLM integration with GPT-5.2 providing detailed reasoning
